channel.title: Upcoming OECD Publication Embargoes and Launches
channel.description: A list of dates and publications

item.title: Modernising Social Services in Spain - Designing a New National Framework
item.description: Modernising Social Services in Spain - Designing a New National Framework by Directorate for Employment, Labour and Social Affairs has an embargo on Tuesday 18 October 2022 at 11:00.
item.oe:directorate: Directorate for Employment, Labour and Social Affairs

item.title: Scotland’s Approach to Regulating Water Charges - Innovation and Collaboration
item.description: Scotland’s Approach to Regulating Water Charges - Innovation and Collaboration by Directorate for Public Governance has an embargo on Wednesday 19 October 2022 at 18:00.

item.description: OECD Economic Surveys: Lithuania 2022 by Economics Department has an embargo on Thursday 20 October 2022 at 11:00.

item.title: Clean Energy Finance and Investment Roadmap of India - Opportunities to Unlock Finance and Scale up Capital
item.description: Clean Energy Finance and Investment Roadmap of India - Opportunities to Unlock Finance and Scale up Capital by Environment Directorate has an embargo on Monday 24 October 2022 at 7:00.

item.title: Improving Early Equity - From Evidence to Action
item.description: Improving Early Equity - From Evidence to Action by Directorate for Education and Skills has an embargo on Wednesday 26 October 2022 at 10:00.

item.title: OCDE‑FAO Perspectivas Agrícolas 2022‑2031
item.description: OCDE‑FAO Perspectivas Agrícolas 2022‑2031 by Trade and Agriculture Directorate has an embargo on Thursday 27 October 2022 at 8:00.

item.title: Pricing Greenhouse Gas Emissions - Turning Climate Targets into Climate Action

item.title: Identifying the Main Drivers of Productivity Growth - A Literature Review
item.description: Identifying the Main Drivers of Productivity Growth - A Literature Review by Statistics and Data Directorate has an embargo on Monday 7 November 2022 at 12:00.
